```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# read in the data manually
raw_bechdel <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09
                        /raw_bechdel.csv')
movies <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/movi
                   es.csv')
```


```{r}
hist(raw_bechdel$year)
hist(movies2$year)
hist(as.numeric(movies2$domgross))
hist(as.numeric(movies2$intgross))
```


```{r}
movies2 <- movies %>% mutate(binary_test = if_else(binary == "PASS", 1, 0))
table(movies2$binary_test)
```

```{r}
hist(movies$imdb_votes)
hist(movies$imdb_rating)
plot(movies$imdb_votes~movies$imdb_rating)
```

```{r}
movies %>% ggplot(mapping = aes(x =  imdb_rating)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
